p: Alizadeh-Sani et al. [ 66] indicated that combining TiO 2 and rosemary essential oil (REO) to form WPI/CNFs films resulted in higher antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive bacteria including S. aureu and L. monocytogenes compared to Gram-negative bacteria including E. coli O 157: H 7, S. enteritidis and P. fluorescens.
